column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Rachel - Thank you for your great review. I'm glad you enjoyed our ramen. Please know we can always provide extra sauce to make your spicy broth even spicier. Although we are limited in terms of substitutions
column2: we can always modify your ramen to the best of our ability to make sure you are completely satisfied. Thanks again
